name: server
//a: This is an example of how to
//b: This is an example of how to

scripts.sd: YARN_RC_FILENAME=./yarnrc.yml && echo 'This is quite slow - ~2m' && time sls deploy --verbose --aws-s3-accelerate
scripts.sdd: YARN_RC_FILENAME=./yarnrc.yml && echo 'This is quite slow - ~2m' && time sls deploy --verbose --aws-s3-accelerate
scripts.sddebug: YARN_RC_FILENAME=./yarnrc.yml && echo 'This is quite slow - ~2m' && time sls deploy --debug \* --verbose --aws-s3-accelerate
scripts.sdf: echo 'This is quite slow - ~1m' && time sls deploy --verbose function -f graphql
